This research involve developmental intervention study design field test online , theory-based behavioral risk reduction intervention HIV-positive MSM use Internet meet potential sex partner . Stage 1 also bring together expert community consultant aid intervention development . Based information gain rapid formative study , first stage research directly lead development novel online theory-based sexual risk reduction intervention ; ( 2 ) test feasibility acceptability newly develop online STI/HIV risk reduction intervention sample HIV-positive MSM use Internet meet sexual partner .
